channel.title: R Package on Erick Chacon
channel.description: Recent content in R Package on Erick Chacon

item.title: Data Simulation Based on Models Formulas
item.description: This package provide tools to simulate data frames based on models formulas. It works with different types of effects and multivariate models.

item.title: Functions for Day-to-Day Data Analysis
item.description: Functions that can be useful in the day-to-day data analysis. It comprehends functions to find paths for projects, make summaries of databases inside folder and so on.

item.title: Model-based Standardized Precipitation Index
item.description: Provide tools to compute and visualize extreme hydro-climatic events using the standardized precipitation index (SPI) and the model-based standardized index (MBSI). The package can also with work with precipitation series containing missing values (NA), \(0\) or only non-zero values.
